experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description:
As Co-Founder of Carso, I lead our mission to revolutionize automotive warranty and service delivery through technology-driven solutions across Kazakhstan. I oversee all business operations while spearheading development of our proprietary mobile and web applications that enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.

Strategic Leadership
• Define long-term strategy, mission, and core values positioning Carso as the market leader in automotive warranty services
• Establish annual KPIs, strategic roadmaps, and measurable goals with executive leadership
• Drive aggressive growth initiatives across Kazakhstan and regional markets

Business Development & Partnerships
• Negotiate and manage high-value partnerships with automotive dealerships and service centers
• Continuously expand Carso's service network to maximize market coverage and customer accessibility
• Identify new revenue streams and business opportunities in the automotive services sector

Technology Innovation
• Guide development roadmap for guarantee programs and innovative service offerings
• Direct feature prioritization, UX/UI design, and engineering sprints for Carso mobile and web platforms
• Ensure our technology stack remains cutting-edge and scalable for future growth

Financial & Operational Excellence
• Oversee budget planning, financial forecasting, and strategic investment decisions
• Maintain rigorous oversight of P&L statements, cash flow management, and capital allocation
• Optimize operational workflows to enhance efficiency, quality, and customer satisfaction

Leadership & Governance
• Recruit, mentor, and develop senior leadership team and key technical talent
• Foster high-performance, customer-centric culture that drives innovation and excellence
• Ensure adherence to local regulations, industry standards, and corporate governance practices

experience.title: Chief Executive Officer & Founder

I define our strategic vision, secure funding, and forge partnerships that transform cutting-edge research into scalable solutions for healthcare, finance, transportation, education, logistics, urban planning, telecommunications, and secure communications.

Architecture & Security

Investor Relations & Operations

Market Expansion & Impact

• Execute go-to-market strategies and establish regional operations across key markets
• Share thought leadership through peer-reviewed publications, innovation awards, and keynote presentations

publications.title: Study of the hydrocarbon-oxidizing activity of Bacillus subtillus on different substrates.
publications.description: Bioremediation of hydrocarbon-contaminated environments using native microorganisms is a promising strategy for addressing oil pollution in Kazakhstan‚Äôs oil-producing areas. This study evaluated the hydrocarbon-oxidizing activity of a Bacillus subtilis strain. Twenty-three isolates were obtained by enrichment culture from oil-saturated soils at the Zhetibai field in the Mangystau region. Cultural, morphological, and biochemical tests following Bergey‚Äôs Manual confirmed the identity of the chosen strain as B. subtilis.Its ability to use crude oil and diesel fuel as sole carbon sources was tested in liquid Luria‚ÄìBertani medium supplemented with either Zhetibai crude oil or commercial diesel (C‚ÇÅ‚ÇÉ‚ÄìC‚ÇÅ‚Çà hydrocarbons, boiling range 200‚Äì330 ¬∞C). Cultures were incubated aerobically at pH 6.5‚Äì7.0, 200 rpm, for 96 hours. Growth was monitored turbidimetrically by measuring optical density at 600 nm to quantify biomass accumulation and substrate utilization. This 96-hour experiment provided detailed insights into growth kinetics and substrate preferences under controlled laboratory conditions.Results showed robust growth of B. subtilis in both media, confirming its biodegradation potential. Diesel-supplemented cultures exhibited a shorter lag phase and higher peak optical density than crude oil cultures, indicating that diesel components are more readily assimilated. These observations reflect differences in hydrocarbon chain length and structure that influence microbial uptake and metabolism.Overall, indigenous B. subtilis strains demonstrate significant potential for degrading petroleum hydrocarbons in contaminated soils. Incorporating these organisms into a tailored microbial consortium could enhance pollutant-removal efficiency. Bioremediation using native bacteria offers an eco-friendly, biologically safe complement to mechanical and chemical cleanup methods, reducing residual contamination while preserving the ecological balance of affected regions.

publications.title: Detecting Various Writing Styles in Documents Through Inherent Stylometric Analysis
publications.description: In this project, we have developed an intelligent system that takes a single document and classifies different writing styles within the document using stylometric analysis. The classification is done using K-Means Clustering (an unsupervised machine learning method). First, the document is divided into chunks of text using a standard chunk size. Then, for each chunk of text, a vector of stylometric features is computed. After that, the chunks are clustered using their vectors of stylometric features. This is where unsupervised machine learning comes into play. The chunks with the same style are clustered together, and the number of clusters made corresponds to the number of different writing styles that the document has. In this approach, the value of K is determined using the Elbow Method. We also ran an experiment for a document with two writing styles, and our system successfully identified that the document had two different writing styles. Our approach separates out text with the same style from that of different styles and can be used to detect plagiarism as well.

publications.title: IoT and AI Applications for Healthcare Diagnostics
publications.description: This comprehensive report investigates the innovative use of Internet of Things (IoT) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies in the realm of healthcare diagnostics. The primary objective is to leverage these cutting-edge technologies to enhance the sustainability of healthcare systems by enabling precise and timely diagnosis of medical conditions. The report explores the methodology, results, and implications of integrating IoT and AI in healthcare, while also shedding light on potential research directions for further advancement.

projects.description: Main Author. Created transformative blockchain-based peer-to-peer factoring platform connecting businesses needing cash flow with global investors, eliminating traditional banking constraints.Problems Solved:‚úÖ Delayed Payments: SMEs face crippling invoice payment delays‚úÖ Limited Capital Access: Traditional banks exclude businesses needing funding most‚úÖ Tied-Up Capital: Billions immobilized in unpaid invoices stifling growthInnovative Solutions:‚úÖ Invoice Tokenization: Blockchain-secured authentic invoice representation‚úÖ Global Investor Access: Worldwide liquidity provider marketplace‚úÖ Smart Contract Automation: Trustless, automated transaction execution‚úÖ Instant Liquidity: Transform unpaid invoices into immediate cashPlatform Features:NFT Invoice Representation: Real-time data with risk scoringDecentralized Risk Assessment: AI/ML-powered evaluation modelsFractionalization Support: Multiple investor participation per invoiceImmutable Records: Complete transparency through blockchain ledgerKey Benefits:For Businesses: Immediate liquidity, flexible terms, global access, cost efficiencyFor Investors: High returns, diversified opportunities, transparent insights, liquid marketsSecurity & Compliance:KYC/AML integration, regulatory compliance, insurance guaranteesMulti-layer security protocols ensuring transaction safetyImpact: Revolutionizes finance by unlocking global invoice liquidity, empowering SMEs and providing attractive investment opportunities.Technologies: Blockchain, Web3, Smart Contracts, DeFi, AI/ML, NFTs

projects.name: AirPol: ML-Powered Environmental Monitoring
projects.description: Developed comprehensive machine learning system for predicting PM2.5 air quality levels, addressing public health challenges and supporting urban planning initiatives across UAE regions.Problem Statement:PM2.5 pollution poses serious health risks in UAEUnique environmental challenges: sandstorms and heavy trafficNeed for accurate forecasting to aid public health and urban planningTechnical Implementation:‚úÖ Advanced ML Models: LSTM for time-series patterns, XGBoost for complex interactions, Random Forest for robust predictions‚úÖ Comprehensive Data Integration: 84,902 hourly entries from National Center of Meteorology, UAE Ministry of Transport, MOHAP‚úÖ Feature Engineering: RFE-identified key predictors including temperature, traffic, and dew point‚úÖ Multi-source Analysis: Meteorological, traffic, and public health data synthesisKey Findings:Random Forest outperformed other models (RMSE: 0.0217)Temperature and dew point identified as top predictorsPM2.5 peaks during early mornings and winter monthsStrong correlations with meteorological factorsImpact Recommendations:Stricter vehicle emission standards implementationReal-time PM2.5 forecasting system deploymentTraffic flow optimization during peak pollution periodsTechnologies: Python, LSTM, XGBoost, Random Forest, TensorFlow, Data Analytics

projects.name: DriveVision - Computer Vision for Driver's License Exams and Automatic Driving of car
projects.description: Main Author. Developed cutting-edge computer vision solution for practical driving license examinations, ensuring unbiased evaluation and enhanced road safety through advanced AI algorithms.Core Capabilities:‚úÖ Biometric Authentication: Prevents proxy test-taking through facial recognition‚úÖ Real-time Violation Detection: Monitors seatbelt usage, speed limits, lane markings‚úÖ Vehicle Independence: Compatible with any vehicle, eliminating test center dependencies‚úÖ Compliance Integration: Adheres to Ministry of Internal Affairs order No. 862Technical Innovation:‚úÖ Transformer Architecture: Advanced perception and prediction using decoder-based modules‚úÖ Bird's-Eye-View Processing: Multi-camera unified spatial understanding‚úÖ Query-Based System: Seamless integration of tracking and road mapping‚úÖ Motion Prediction: Real-time trajectory forecasting for collision avoidanceAchievements:25% reduction in assessment errors during MVP demonstrationSuccessfully tested in controlled and real-world environmentsRobust performance across diverse driving conditionsEnhanced decision-making through data-driven insightsImpact: Automated, unbiased driving skill evaluation minimizing human error while significantly improving road safety assessment accuracy.Technologies: Computer Vision, Transformers, PyTorch, Multi-camera Systems, Real-time Processing

projects.name: Stocker - AI-Powered SMB Financial Management
projects.description: Main Author. Created comprehensive AI-driven financial management platform specifically designed for small and medium businesses, addressing the critical cash flow mismanagement that causes 82% of SMB failures.Critical Problem Solved:82% of SMBs fail due to cash flow mismanagementDifficulty tracking money and analyzing financial dataExpensive enterprise tools inaccessible to small businessesAI-Powered Solutions:‚úÖ Transaction Tracking: Every financial movement monitored automatically‚úÖ Cash Flow Optimization: AI-driven insights for better financial decisions‚úÖ Trend Visualization: Instant visual analytics and reporting‚úÖ Predictive Analytics: Proactive financial planning and risk managementMarket Opportunity:400M SMBs globally ‚âà 224M potential users65% ready to invest in AI solutions56% find current tools too costlyCompetitive Advantages:‚úÖ Simplicity: AI-driven insights accessible to non-financial experts‚úÖ Customization: Tailored categories for specific business needs‚úÖ Affordability: Enterprise functionality at SMB-friendly pricing‚úÖ Competitive Edge: Transform financial management into business advantageProven Results:Platform in beta testing with positive feedbackEarly adopters report 15% expense savings within 3 monthsSecured partnerships with accounting firms and banking API providersReal success story: Bakery owner reduced costs by 20% and accelerated growthPricing Strategy: $1.99 weekly, $9.99 monthly, $99.99 yearly based on market researchTechnologies: AI/ML, Financial APIs, Data Analytics, Cloud Computing, Business Intelligence

projects.name: eDiploma
projects.description: Pioneered Kazakhstan's first NFT diploma system, creating a comprehensive blockchain-based educational credential platform that revolutionizes how academic achievements are issued, verified, and managed.System Components:‚úÖ Smart Contract Generator: Automated creation of blockchain-secured diploma contracts‚úÖ Credential Portal: User-friendly interface for institutions and graduates‚úÖ NFT Integration: Unique, tamper-proof digital diplomas as non-fungible tokens‚úÖ Verification System: Instant, transparent credential authenticationKey Innovation:- First in Kazakhstan: Launched the country's pioneering NFT diploma system in 2023- Patent Protected: Secured intellectual property rights (Patent KZ 38001)- Blockchain Security: Immutable educational credentials preventing fraud- Global Accessibility: Digital-first approach enabling worldwide verificationProblem Solved:Traditional paper diplomas are vulnerable to forgery, difficult to verify internationally, and prone to loss or damage. eDiploma addresses these challenges through:- Instant verification capabilities- Permanent, unforgeable digital records- Global accessibility and recognition- Reduced administrative burden for institutionsImpact:- Enhanced trust in educational credentials- Streamlined verification processes for employers- Reduced fraud in academic achievements- Modern, future-ready credential managementTechnical Architecture:- Blockchain-based smart contracts for security- NFT technology for unique digital ownership- User portal for easy access and management- Integration capabilities with educational institutionsMarket Position: As part of Jasaim's product portfolio alongside JasWallet, eDiploma represents a significant step toward digitizing educational infrastructure in Kazakhstan and beyond.Technologies: NFT, Digital Credentials

projects.name: CryptoProphet - Advanced Cryptocurrency Prediction Platform
projects.description: Main Author. Developed sophisticated machine learning platform for precise cryptocurrency price predictions, empowering traders and investors with data-driven decision-making tools.Problem Addressed:Lack of thorough market dynamics understanding among crypto investorsNeed for accurate risk assessment and trend analysisMarket volatility requiring advanced predictive modelsTechnical Approach:‚úÖ Advanced Algorithms: Prophet time series forecasting and Linear Regression‚úÖ Classification Models: K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) for pattern recognition‚úÖ Data Preprocessing: Comprehensive missing data handling and normalization‚úÖ Multi-Dataset Integration: Real-time verified cryptocurrency market dataKey Features:Daily updated datasets with accurate market informationAdvanced handling of data imbalances using SMOTE and ADASYNEnsemble models with hyperparameter optimizationPerformance metrics showcase with actual vs. predicted visualizationsResults:Successful prediction of Ethereum price rise trends25-year forecast: $12,446 USD (ETH)100-year projection: $44,366 USD (ETH)High accuracy in short and long-term predictionsImpact: Reduces financial losses through informed trading decisions while enhancing investor confidence in cryptocurrency markets.

projects.name: AutoAI for text
projects.description: During my tenure as Lead Developer at IBM Research (May 2023 - September 2023), I spearheaded a comprehensive benchmark evaluation for the AutoAI-for-Text Heterogeneous Model Optimizer project üöÄ. AutoAI for text is IBM's cutting-edge framework that democratizes NLP model development by automating the complex process of building advanced text processing pipelines for users across different skill levels ü§ñ.My primary contributions included:üîß Evaluation Framework Development: I designed and implemented robust evaluation setups to execute AutoAI-for-Text across multiple configurations and diverse datasets, systematically collecting performance metrics and cost data to assess system effectiveness.üìä Comprehensive Testing & Benchmarking: I conducted extensive testing of AutoAI-for-Text across various datasets and configurations, then expanded the benchmarking infrastructure to evaluate competitive AutoAI systems, providing critical comparative analysis against our platform.‚ö° Version Comparison & Optimization: I executed detailed benchmark evaluations comparing different AutoAI-for-Text versions, identifying algorithmic enhancements and specific use cases where particular configurations excelled.üß† Advanced Model Implementation: I progressed from initial TPOT classifier implementations on simple datasets to sophisticated BERT-based text classification systems, incorporating hyperparameter optimization grids and GPU-accelerated training processes.üìà Results Analysis & Presentation: I synthesized complex performance data, interpreted results, and presented findings to stakeholders, documenting gaps and issues from user perspectives to guide future development.

projects.name: GazeWriter - Eye-Tracking Communication Platform
projects.description: Developed groundbreaking assistive technology enabling hands-free computer interaction through advanced eye-tracking, empowering individuals with mobility limitations to communicate and work independently.Critical Accessibility Problems Addressed:‚úÖ Mobility Barriers: 15M+ people globally unable to use traditional input devices‚úÖ Communication Limitations: Physical disabilities preventing digital interaction‚úÖ Expensive Solutions: Existing eye-tracking systems cost $10,000-50,000‚úÖ Limited Accessibility: Complex setup requiring specialized hardwareInnovative Eye-Tracking Solutions:‚úÖ Eyelid Movement Detection: Advanced computer vision tracking subtle eye movements‚úÖ Virtual Keyboard Control: Mouse cursor navigation using natural eye motions‚úÖ Click Functionality: Blink-based selection and typing capabilities‚úÖ Audio Conversion: Text-to-speech output for complete communication cycleCore Features:Real-Time Eye Tracking: Millisecond-precision eyelid movement detectionAdaptive Calibration: Personalized setup accommodating individual eye patternsVirtual Keyboard Interface: Intuitive on-screen typing with gaze controlMulti-Modal Output: Text display with integrated audio synthesisAccessibility Optimization: Designed specifically for users with physical limitationsTechnical Innovation:‚úÖ Computer Vision AI: Advanced algorithms processing eye movement patterns‚úÖ Low-Cost Implementation: Standard webcam compatibility vs expensive hardware‚úÖ Real-Time Processing: Instant response to eye movements for fluid interaction‚úÖ Cross-Platform Support: Works across different operating systems and devicesCompetitive Advantages:‚úÖ Cost-Effective: 95% cheaper than existing commercial eye-tracking solutions‚úÖ Easy Setup: No specialized hardware required, works with standard cameras‚úÖ Comprehensive Solution: Complete communication pipeline from input to audio output

projects.name: JasWallet - Business-Focused Cryptocurrency Platform
projects.description: Created comprehensive cryptocurrency wallet solution specifically designed for business environments, educational institutions, and professional use cases.Company Background:Top 100 Kazakhstan startup 2022 (AstanaHub Digital Bridge)First NFT Diplomas launch in Kazakhstan (2023)AstanaHub resident with NURIS and MBRSL program victoriesCore Features:‚úÖ Multi-Currency Support: Buy & sell cryptocurrency with seamless transactions‚úÖ DApp Browser: Integrated decentralized application access‚úÖ Custom Token Integration: Backend support for loading custom tokens‚úÖ Gamification: User engagement through interactive featuresMarket Analysis:TAM: $6.834 billion (global students/graduates with crypto capacity)SAM: $22.639 million (actively interested crypto users)SOM: $10.641 million (realistically convertible users)Competitive Advantages:‚úÖ Analytical and statistical tools integration‚úÖ NFT data deletion capabilities‚úÖ Comprehensive API access‚úÖ Cross-platform integration features‚úÖ AI implementation for enhanced user experience‚úÖ Kazakhstan market specialization‚úÖ Automated processes and skill development algorithms

projects.name: ALRAHALAH Travel Buddy - Tourism Analytics Platform
projects.description: Main Author. Led development of an innovative wristband-based tourism data collection system supporting Sheikh Mohammed Bin Rashid's 2030 tourism strategy. The solution provides comprehensive tourist behavior analytics through:‚úÖ Smart Wristband Technology: NFC-enabled device with heart monitoring, contactless payments, and renewable energy operation‚úÖ Data Collection Infrastructure: Real-time tracking of tourist movements, spending patterns, and location preferences‚úÖ AI-Powered Insights: Predictive analytics identifying tourism hotspots, seasonal trends, and revenue optimization opportunities‚úÖ Government Integration: Centralized platform for tourism authorities to access unified visitor dataKey Features:Contactless check-ins at hotels, airports, and attractionsDigital documentation storage (passport, visa, insurance)AI-generated personalized tourist experiencesSustainable design with solar panel integrationImpact: Enables government to understand exactly where tourists go, when they visit, and how much they spend - revolutionizing tourism industry decision-making and enhancing visitor experiences across the UAE.
